snippet: Good, moderately priced Bordeaux is out there, wines that convey if not the grandeur of the region’s best wines at least a sense of what’s so good about them.
abstract: Eric Asimov Wines of The Times column contends there are good, moderately priced Bordeaux out there and they are wines that convey if not the grandeur of the region’s best wines at least a sense of what’s so good about them; tasting report.
lead_paragraph: Good, moderately priced Bordeaux is out there, wines that convey if not the grandeur of the region’s best wines at least a sense of what’s so good about them.

headline.seo: Bordeaux at Reasonable Prices Is a Possibility - Wines of The Times
